title: Run FO-03 E2E test and fix issues until passing
description:
Run the FO-03 E2E test and iterate on fixes until it passes.

IMPORTANT: Run tests in NON-HEADLESS mode (headless: false) so we can see the browser.

Command to run:
node --import tsx e2e/fo-03.test.ts

Troubleshooting:
1. If test fails, analyze the error
2. Fix the component or test as needed
3. Re-run until passing

Common issues:
- Selector not found: Update selector to match actual DOM
- Timeout on generation: Increase timeout or check server action
- Animation timing: Add waits or adjust expectations
- Step not advancing: Check state management

The test should complete the full 13-step flow successfully.
acceptance_criteria: node --import tsx e2e/fo-03.test.ts passes with all assertions green
closed_reason: Test already passing - ran twice with consistent success. Minor warning about 'Hopeful' chip is benign since it's in FEELINGS_MORE_CHIPS (requires clicking 'More+'), but 'Motivated' chip is successfully selected which enables Continue button.
